item.title: A series of potholes down the centre of the road., 16th February
item.description:
A series of potholes down the centre of the road, between the mini roundabout and the Co-Op on Parton Road (near the Library). It looks as if one or two potholes had recently been repaired, but I think these repairs are starting to break up again. There are several potholes roughly following the centre line. Could they be reviewed and ideally repaired.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain surround has broken down again, 15th February
item.description:
The Drain surround has broken down again. This is northbound towards the Hare and Hounds, on the corner of Parton Road, just before the turning for St Johns Avenue. Could the surround be built back up please ?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole by drain cover very dangerous, 15th February
item.description:
Drain cover just past the farm towards Churchdown. Pot hole is deep, damaging vehicles, unable to avoid as on a corner.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes in roadway of Whitethorn Drive, 15th February
item.description:
There are numerous potholes appearing in Whitethorn Drive. They are getting worse by the day? Please can someone survey & instruct remedial repairs. I thought the County Council had a duty to routinely inspect roadways on a periodic basis - this clearly has not been done recently in Whitethorn Drive!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Whitethorn Drive, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road gulley blocked causing dangerous road & footpath flooding, 15th February
item.description:
Road adj to lamppost 10 Bouncers Lane. Every time there is more than light rainfall, this is the scene. It has been terrible for the past few days and really needs sorting. It has been steadily getting worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Bouncers Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
